clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of HSK21542 Injection for Analgesia in Subjects Undergoing Colonoscopy
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Two-stage, Phase II Clinical Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of HSK21542 Injection for Analgesia in Subjects Undergoing Diagnostic or Therapeutic Colonoscopy

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-center, randomized, two-stage, phase II clinical study .The main objective is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of HSK21542 injection for analgesia in patients undergoing colonoscopy, and, combining the pharmacodynamic (PD) and pharmacokinetic (PK) characteristics

study_design_info.masking_description: Stage I is open-label,Stage II is double-blind

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the efficacy of HSK21542 injection for analgesia in subjects undergoing colonoscopy.
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study drug to removal of colonoscope on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of HSK21542 injection for analgesia in subjects undergoing colonoscopy.
secondary_outcome.description: The incidence and severity of adverse events (AEs)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From administration until 24 hours after administration
